import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, CardBody, Breadcrumb, Button, BreadcrumbItem } from 'reactstrap'; import { activateAuthLayout } from '../../store/actions'; import { Link, withRouter } from 'react-router-dom'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import SweetAlert from 'react-bootstrap-sweetalert'; import Settingmenu from '../Subpages/Settingmenu'; import logosm from '../../images/logo-sm.png'; class Uisweetalert extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { basic: false, with_title: false, success_msg: false, confirm_msg: false, success_dlg: false, error_dlg: false, dynamic_title: '', dynamic_description: '', confirm_both: false, img_header: false, img_html: false, custom_div: false, emailtxt: '', emailerr: '', step1: false, step1_txt: '', step2: false, step2_txt: '', step3: false, step3_txt: '', step_queue: false, final_queue: false, current_ip: '219.91.239.22', close_timer: false, timeralert: null }; this.handleStep1Change = this.handleStep1Change.bind(this); this.handleStep2Change = this.handleStep2Change.bind(this); this.handleStep3Change = this.handleStep3Change.bind(this); } componentDidMount() { this.props.activateAuthLayout(); } handleStep1Change(e) { this.setState({ step1_txt: e.target.value }); } handleStep2Change(e) { this.setState({ step2_txt: e.target.value }); } handleStep3Change(e) { this.setState({ step3_txt: e.target.value }); } stimer() { const getTimer = () => ( HTML AutoClose Timer!} onConfirm={() => this.hideTimeAlert()} > Timer Will Expire after 3 Seconds.); this.setState({ timeralert: getTimer() }); setTimeout(function () { this.setState({ timeralert: null }); }.bind(this), 3000); } hideTimeAlert() { this.setState({ timeralert: null }); } render() { return (

SweetAlert 2

Veltrix UI Elements SweetAlert 2
{this.state.timeralert} {this.state.success_dlg ? this.setState({ success_dlg: false })} > {this.state.dynamic_description} : null} {this.state.error_dlg ? this.setState({ error_dlg: false })} > {this.state.dynamic_description} : null}

Examples

A beautiful, responsive, customizable and accessible (WAI-ARIA) replacement for JavaScript's popup boxes. Zero dependencies.

A basic message

{this.state.basic ? this.setState({ basic: false })} > : null}

A title with a text under

{this.state.with_title ? this.setState({ with_title: false })} > That thing is still around? : null}

A success message!

{this.state.success_msg ? this.setState({ success_msg: false })} onCancel={() => this.setState({ success_msg: false })} > You clicked the button! : null} {/*

A warning message, with a function attached to the "Confirm"-button...

*/}

By passing a parameter, you can execute something else for "Cancel".

{this.state.confirm_both ? this.setState({ confirm_both: false, success_dlg: true, dynamic_title: 'Deleted', dynamic_description: 'Your file has been deleted.' })} onCancel={() => this.setState({ confirm_both: false, error_dlg: true, dynamic_title: 'Cancelled', dynamic_description: 'Your imaginary file is safe :)' })} > You won't be able to revert this! : null}

A message with custom Image Header

{this.state.img_header ? this.setState({ img_header: false })} > Modal with a custom image. : null} {/*

A message with auto close timer

*/}

Custom HTML description and buttons

{this.state.img_html ? HTML example!} warning onConfirm={() => this.setState({ img_html: false })} > You can use bold text, links and other HTML tags : null}

A message with custom width, padding and background

{this.state.custom_div ? this.setState({ custom_div: false })} > : null}

Ajax request example

{this.state.ajax_div ? this.setState({ ajax_div: false, success_dlg: true, dynamic_title: 'Ajax request finished!', dynamic_description: 'Submitted email : ' + this.state.emailtxt, })} onCancel={() => this.setState({ ajax_div: false })} > : null}

Chaining modals (queue) example

{this.state.step1 ? this.setState({ step1: false, step2: true })} onCancel={() => this.setState({ step1: false })} > Chaining swal2 modals is easy : null} {this.state.step2 ? this.setState({ step2: false, step3: true })} onCancel={() => this.setState({ step2: false })} > Chaining swal2 modals is easy : null} {this.state.step3 ? this.setState({ step3: false, final_step: true })} onCancel={() => this.setState({ step3: false })} > Chaining swal2 modals is easy : null} {this.state.final_step ? this.setState({ final_step: false })} > Your answers : [{this.state.step1_txt}, {this.state.step2_txt}, {this.state.step3_txt}] : null}

Dynamic queue example

{this.state.step_queue ? this.setState({ step_queue: false, final_queue: true })} > Your public IP will be received via AJAX request : null} {this.state.final_queue ? this.setState({ final_queue: false })} > {this.state.current_ip} : null} ); } } export default withRouter(connect(null, { activateAuthLayout })(Uisweetalert));
